00201       pslash = strchr(pslash + 1, '/');
00202       if (!bslash)
00203          pslash = strchr(pslash + 1, '/');
00204       if (pslash) {
00205          strncpy(strtmp, eqpstr, pslash - eqpstr);
00206          strcat(strtmp, "/settings");
00207 
00208          if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, strtmp, &hKeyS) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00209             db_get_key(hDB, hKeyS, &key);
00210             for (i = 0;; i++) { /* search first for "Names element" */
00211                db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyS, i, &hSubKey);
00212                if (!hSubKey)
00213                   break;
00214                db_get_key(hDB, hSubKey, &key);
00215                if (key.name[5] && key.type == TID_STRING) {     /* fmt Names xxxx */
00216                   p = &(key.name[6]);
00217                   if (strstr(p, element) == NULL)
00218                      continue;
00219                   *esize = key.item_size;
00220                   size = *esize * key.num_values;
00221                   *pname = malloc(size);
00222                   status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubKey, *pname, &size, key.type);
00223                   return key.num_values;
00224                }
00225             }
00226             /* rescan dir for "Names" only now */
00227             db_get_key(hDB, hKeyS, &key);
00228             for (i = 0;; i++) {
00229                db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyS, i, &hSubKey);
00230                if (!hSubKey)
00231                   break;
00232                db_get_key(hDB, hSubKey, &key);
00233                if (strncmp(key.name, "Names", 5) == 0) {        /* fmt Names (only) */
00234                   *esize = key.item_size;
00235                   size = *esize * key.num_values;
00236                   *pname = malloc(size);
00237                   status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubKey, *pname, &size, key.type);
00238                   return key.num_values;
00239                }
00240             }
00241          }
00242       }
00243    }
00244    return 0;
00245 }
